ProductInfo.Features:
These Dome Video CCTV Surveillance Cameras Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems to Keep Home, Office, Hotel etc. Safe.
Violet Dome Shape, No Audio, 3.6mm Lens for Wide View Angle, BNC Connection, DC 12V 500MA Regulated Power Supply.
Image Sensor: 1/4 Sharp CCD. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. Signal System: PAL. Effective Pixels: 752 (H) x 582 (V).
The Distributed 5mm Diameters. 850nm Wavelength, 24PCS Infrared LEDs, Makes It Have Good Night Vision Effects.
Auto White Balance, Internal Sync Speed, Backlight Compensation, Low Power Consumption Board Make Its Performance Stable.
ProductInfo.Name: BW® 4 Pack - Vandal Resistant Dome IR Indoor Outdoor Environments Day Night Security Camera, 420TVL, 1/4 Inch Sharp CCD Night Vision CCTV Security Video Surveillance System Camera, Auto White Balance
